items.title: Poland scrambles jets, closes Lublin airport in 'preventative' move

items.title: The WSJ carelessly spread anti-trans misinformation
items.summary: While I generally respect The Wall Street Journal, every once in a while it sees fit to remind me that it is, in fact, owned by Rupert Murdoch. items.title: Apple’s M4 Pro Mac mini with 24GB of RAM and a 2x storage upgrade is now $200 off
items.summary:
B&H is now offering an even lower price on the upgraded M4 Pro Mac mini with 24GB of RAM and a 2x storage bump. This is Apple’s latest pro-grade Mac mini with the 1TB SSD now at $200 less than you’ll pay direct or anywhere else we can find. 

more…

items.title: Nintendo announces Super Mario Galaxy + Galaxy 2 bundle: Runs in 4K on Switch 2, new content, more
items.summary:
Update: Pre-orders on physical copies of the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle are now live at Walmart and Target. 

Tomorrow is the 40th anniversary for Super Mario Bros. and Nintendo is ready to celebrate. During today’s Direct presentation it debuted a ton of exciting updates and new releases for Mario’s 40th, including a new teaser trailer and confirmation of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. However, on top of that we are also getting a new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle release as well as two new companion amiibo figures too. 

more…

items.title: Virtual Boy revealed for Switch Online alongside re-created Virtual Boy hardware
items.summary:
During today’s lengthy Nintendo Direct, we did not get any updates on the Switch Online GameCube library, but Nintendo did officially announce Virtual Boy! It is ready to add an entirely new console to its Nintendo Classics collection in the form of the ultra-retro Virtual Boy library alongside an actual Virtual Boy peripheral you stick your Switch or Switch 2 inside of. Details below.

What we love

Declutter your space or easily lug gear from one place to the next with these reusable moving bags. Each bag spans 29 by 13 by 14 inches and boasts 29 gallons of internal storage. My favorite perk however is that each bag has built-in straps to make it easy to haul things from A to B.

items.title: Treat your smartphone like the computer it actually is with this foldable keyboard and stand at $15
items.summary:
OMOTON Foldable Bluetooth Keyboard with Smartphone Stand

Buy for $15 (Reg. $17)

What we love

When in a pinch, smartphones can really knock out a large number of tasks that we generally use a computer for. Yes, it’s much more convenient to use a tablet, laptop, or desktop, but none of those things fit in your pocket. This rechargeable keyboard with 40-hour battery life can, and another perk is that it is refueled over USB-C.

Communicating complex systems, workflows, or project plans doesn’t have to involve a jumble of spreadsheets and countless emails. Whether you’re leading a team, presenting data to stakeholders, or aiming to clarify a project, Microsoft Visio Professional offers the visual tools you need to simplify the complicated. Right now, you can purchase a lifetime license for just $9.97 (Reg. $249.99).

items.title: All of the Mario 40th anniversary reveals: Mario Galaxy, Tennis Fever, new Yoshi game, and an actual Talking Flower
items.summary:
Nintendo’s big September Direct is a wrap and it certainly did not disappoint for Mario’s big 40th anniversary. The first Super Mario Bros. game released almost exactly 40 years ago and Nintendo unsheathed this year’s celebration with a host of key announcements in the form of upgraded versions of beloved Mario classics, a new Switch 2 Edition of one of the best 2D Mario games of the modern era, the official announcement of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, a new Yoshi game, the new Mario Tennis experience, and a even a talking flower. 

more…

items.title: If your old gym shorts have seen better days, might as well grab five pairs from just $4.50 each
items.summary:
LalaHooK Gym Shorts (5-pack)

Buy from $23 (Reg. $25)

What we love

From my perspective, it can feel like a waste of money to fork over a bunch of cash for gym clothes you’re just going to deliberately wear out anyway. That’s why I recommend going with some affordable shorts like these. Pricing kicks off from $4.50 per pair, and with this bundle you’ll be able to hit the gym five times before needing to do laundry.

items.title: Govee’s Smart Electric Gooseneck Kettle has fallen back to its $54 Prime Day low (Reg. up to $80), more from $40
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its Smart Electric Gooseneck Kettle at $54.38 shipped. While it is listed with an $80 MSRP, we’ve been more recently seeing it go for $64 since July, which was also the first time discounts took the costs down to this low rate, repeating once again during the first week of August. That low price is coming back around for a third time today, landing it $26 under its MSRP for the best price we have tracked. Head below for more on this and the other Govee kitchen gadgets currently seeing discounts.
